attributes.action: We want an Inquiry/Report on Tony Blair specifically...
attributes.additional_details: MoD figures show that on top of 453 British deaths in Afghanistan, more than 7,300 were treated in field hospital. In Iraq, there were 173 deaths and 5,800 were treated in field hospitals. As of March 2015, approximately 210,000 civilians have died violent deaths as a result of the wars.
attributes.background: The Chilcot Inquiry/Report does not allow for Tony Blair's war crimes to be taken into consideration. We would like Tony Blair to answer for his crimes against British soldiers & families as well as foreign lives lost based on his lies and aggression.

rejection.details: It's not clear what you want a second inquiry to examine.
